text: Us waqt woh log jinhon ne iman laa kar neik tarz e amal iktiyar kiya hai apne ajar poorey poorey payenge aur Allah apne fazal se unko mazeed ajar ata farmayega. Aur jin logon ne bandagi ko aar samjha aur takabbur kiya hai unko Allah dardnaak saza dega aur Allah ke siwa jin jin ki sarparasti o madadgaari par woh bharosa rakhte hain unmein se kisi ko bhi woh wahan na payenge
